snippet: A popular Canadian video celebrating diversity that pokes fun at lugers hits on themes that the Americans say are old, tired and inappropriate.
abstract: Sochi Olympics Roundup; members of American luge team express irritation at popular Canadian video that celebrates diversity by implying that luge is a vaguely gay sport; say theme is old, tired and inappropriate.
lead_paragraph: A popular Canadian video celebrating diversity that pokes fun at lugers hits on themes that the Americans say are old, tired and inappropriate.

headline.main: American Lugers Annoyed by Group’s Gay Rights Video
